channel.title: SerbScape! Brand new! [Jagex-Like 3x] [525]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Z8BGNrP.png[/img][/center]
[center][b][size=18pt]SerbScape![/size][/b]
[size=14pt]Client Download: [url=http://"http://serbcraft.servehttp.com/downloads/serbscapepclient.zip"]Here[/url] Forums Located [url=http://"http://serbcraft.servehttp.com/serbscape/forum.php"]Here[/url] [/size][/center]
This server is a 3x Jagex-Like server that is under HEAVY Development and is in dire need of staff. You can apply for a staff position on the forums!
What I am currently working on in this server: -Everything -No really... -NPC Clipping -Shops -Quests -NPC Animations -NPC Drops -Fix displayed energy as opposed to actual energy -Anything you guys suggest on the SerbScape forums.
I am using the TeamTorva client I am running Project Insanity.
What I have done so far! -Fixed woodcutting/fishing/mining/smithing -Fixed various different NPC animations *In the process of creating a friendly leveling environment -Added Jagex-Like to loot to various different NPCs -Added an energy system (It does run out but number stays at 100)
if you guys have any trouble or questions just ask!

item.title: SerbScape! Brand new! [Jagex-Like 3x] [525]
item.dc:creator: @Serberus7 Serberus7
item.description:
@Serberus7 wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:2, topic:483626”]Needs:
-Banner
-Explanation of server type (insta pk, 2006 remake, 2007 remake, skill/pk, zombie infection server, etc.)
-List of staff
-Screenshots
-Possible YouTube video of server’s contents
-Revision # (317, 474, 718, etc.)
-List of what is fully functional, what is being worked on, and what you still have to do.

Good luck![/quote]
Yes it most definitely should.
Don’t worry, It will end up looking a lot like my minecraft thread (in signature)
For now, All I can add is Revision and Explanation of server type because I’m at work right now and can’t do much media. The only staff is myself which is why applications are open on my forums.

Thanks for the heads up though.

Read full topic

This server is a 3x Jagex-Like server that is under HEAVY Development and is in dire need of staff. You can apply for a staff position on the forums!

What I am currently working on in this server:
-Everything
-No really…
-NPC Clipping
-Shops
-Quests
-NPC Animations
-NPC Drops
-Fix displayed energy as opposed to actual energy
-Anything you guys suggest on the SerbScape forums.

I am using the TeamTorva client
I am running Project Insanity.

What I have done so far!
-Fixed woodcutting/fishing/mining/smithing
-Fixed various different NPC animations
*In the process of creating a friendly leveling environment
-Added Jagex-Like to loot to various different NPCs
-Added an energy system (It does run out but number stays at 100)

if you guys have any trouble or questions just ask!
